channel.title: Some really rare shop problem .. :::!?!:::
channel.description:
well this is my problem
::if i put my shop in client.java ::than put npc in autospawn ::than i also look if de npc doesn't exist already
===================================
still everything allright but now comes the problem
===================================
if i add a item in shop.. than it goes wrong.. it gives some errors..
mostly 1 item goes well..
but if i add 2 items it goes wrong.. and it gives error in runserver.bat
any help plz
anyoneknow knows what to do?
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 000 537 1800" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:35)

item.title: Some really rare shop problem .. :::!?!:::
item.dc:creator: @cook cook
item.description:
@cook wrote:

sniper is right also if you need help finding the space press ctrl + f and look for and then find something that should be there (eather side of a = and in names of shops are ok)

Read full topic

item.title: Some really rare shop problem .. :::!?!:::
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

You must use tab to space this. Also if 537 is your ID it would be 0537.
